no_items: No items found that meet your criteria. Try changing your search term or clearing some filters to show more items.
accept_modal_instructions: After accepting the item in the ArcGIS Living Atlas of the World, the change will take at least 5 minutes to be applied.
accept_modal_nrd_instructions: Set the item's review cycle in months. (Optional: You can also set when the item will be removed from the Living Atlas.)
review_cycle_tooltip:
The review cycle for an item can be set to occur every 3, 6, or 12 months.
The review cycle begins once the item is accepted.
eol_tooltip: You can set a date when the item should be automatically removed from the Living Atlas. If set, the item will be removed on the first day of the following month.
eolBeforeNrdMsg: NOTE: This item is set to be Auto Removed from the Living Atlas before the Next Review cycle.
non_curator: Please contact Deane Kensok or Paul Dodd
accept_suggection_modal_instructions: Accept the curator's suggestion and send them a message or use the default message below.
decline_suggection_modal_instructions: Decline the curator's suggestion and send them a message or use the default message below.
decline_suggection_modal_instructions_pl: The item should not include this category.
